name: Zodiac Plus
description: Enhanced 13-card zodiac spread with additional spirit card and complex semantic associations

fire_triplicity.description: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius - Creative Action and Will

earth_triplicity.description: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn - Manifestation and Stability

air_triplicity.description: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius - Communication and Ideas

water_triplicity.description: Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces - Emotion and Intuition

spirit_essence.description: Central spiritual guidance and soul lesson

guidance_rules.guidance: **Spiritual Mastery**: The ${spirit} card indicates alignment with higher purpose and divine guidance
**Elemental Harmony**: Balance between ${fire} (action) and ${water} (emotion) creates powerful transformation
**Karmic Gateway**: This reading represents a major life transition and soul-level learning
**Leadership Calling**: Cardinal signs suggest it's time to take initiative and lead change
**Material Manifestation**: Strong ${earth} influence focuses on practical outcomes and tangible results
**Inner Reflection**: Multiple reversed cards indicate the need for introspection before action
**Major Life Cycle**: Presence of major transition cards marks a significant life chapter ending/beginning
**Social Dynamics**: Multiple court cards highlight relationships and social interactions
